metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20230 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in PSPP 1.2.0. There is a heap-based bufferoverflow at the function read_bytes_internal in utilities/pspp-dump-sav.c,which allows attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) orpossibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: pspp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
